tool.name: Line Simplification
tool.description: Line simplification implementing the Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm.<br/><br/>Refererences:<br/>- Ramer, U. (1972): An iterative procedure for the polygonal approximation of plane curves. Computer Graphics and Image Processing, 1(3), 244-256<br/>- Douglas, D., Peucker, T. (1973): Algorithms for the reduction of the number of points required to represent a digitized line or its caricature. The Canadian Cartographer 10(2), 112-122<br/><br/>- Polyline Reduction source code at <a target="_blank" href="http://mappinghacks.com/code/PolyLineReduction/">mappinghacks.com</a><br/>

param.name: LINES
param.label: Lines
param.help: Line or polygon shapefile to simplify.

param.name: TOLERANCE
param.label: Tolerance
param.help: Maximum deviation allowed between original and simplified curve [map units].
